Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory783.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'm definitely scaring 【kuroname】 this time...", 4: '1'}
{3: "A familiar figure stands by the water, her back to you, busy with something you can't quite see. You wait patiently, but after a while, you can't help quietly calling out to her."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'A strange sound echoes, and the mermaid suddenly collapses onto the ground, scattering her belongings all around.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'H-h-how are you here already?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You look so busy...', 3: '16', 4: "I've been here for a while now.", 5: '16'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'The operation is a total failure...', 4: '1'}
{3: "You don't know what Lamia's talking about, but you help her up and then bend down to gather the things she dropped."}
{3: "The colorful wrapping paper is bright and adorable, and there's a faint whiff of charcoal and sulfur—could these be cold sparklers?"}
{3: "Suddenly, you realize what's happening. You turn to the neatly arranged beach area behind her."}

{3: "In the distance, shallow artificial waves gently lap the shore, creating a steady and peaceful backdrop. With that setting, the entire beach is redone, turned into the little mermaid's garden of her own."}
{3: 'The cold sparklers and tiny candles in the sand form a crooked, half-finished heart shape.'}
{3: 'She must have spent so much time getting all this ready.'}
{3: 'The mermaid keeps her head down, twisting her fingers, clearly dejected.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I was... hoping to show this to you once night falls.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "But... it's not really a surprise now, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Of course it's a surprise!", 3: '30', 4: 'Thank you for setting this all up.', 5: '30'}
{3: 'She lets out a relieved breath, pats her chest, and a bright smile spreads across her face.'}
{2: "You've gone through all this trouble...", 3: '34'}
{2: "But if I didn't show up, what would you do?", 3: '35'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Huh? If... if you didn't show up...", 4: '1'}
{3: "You watch her get flustered, her brows furrowing as she mumbles under her breath, and you can't help but laugh."}
{3: 'She hears your laughter and freezes for a second, then it dawns on her, and she complains in annoyance.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Hey...! Y-you're messing with me, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "W-well, you've seen it all now, so I'm just going to rest for a bit...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia puffs out her cheeks and settles down, hugging her knees.'}
{3: "It's not often she stays so focused, so it'd be a shame not to wrap this up before dark."}
{2: "I promise I'll show up whenever you invite me.", 3: '47'}
{2: "Now, let's finish this together.", 3: '48'}
{3: 'You offer your hand to her. Touched by your serious expression, Lamia hesitates, then quietly responds.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Um... w-well... alright, then...', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory784.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{3: "Night falls, and Lamia and you light the fireworks and candles she's prepared."}
{3: 'All at once, dazzling sparks erupt, dancing in front of your eyes.'}
{3: 'You slip your hand into hers without a word. She jolts slightly, then gently curls her fingers around yours.'}
{3: 'As the darkness grows deeper, the fireworks glow even brighter—yet Lamia shrinks behind you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Ugh... It's not at all like I imagined—it's so bright, my eyes are hurting.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "But we've spent ages getting ready for this...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "So... let them shine a bit longer... I'll just keep my eyes on you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The cold fireworks finally burn out, leaving only embers, and everything around you grows quiet.'}
{3: 'You two put out the last sparks. She keeps her head down, staring at the charred remains, like something has just occurred to her, and a flicker of sadness crosses her face.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Is it really... ending just like that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'This feels a bit too sudden. I still have... one last gift for you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Don't worry. I've got it all set.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She brings out a jar almost half her height. Something churns inside, sounding like water.'}
{2: 'Wh-what is this?', 3: '73'}

{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I overheard rumors about Double Seventh morning well water—it's said to ward off evil, cure illnesses, and even prolong life. It took me a long time to find it, so I hauled back as much as I could!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I don't really understand how it all works, but...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I want you... to stay in good health and avoid any serious harm.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "And I hope you won't suddenly vanish, the way fireworks do once they've burned out...", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm not going anywhere.", 3: '79', 4: 'The same to you.', 5: '79'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Since it's a festival, shouldn't we focus on positive topics instead...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Positive... Positive...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Ugh, I can't think of a single thing. Just spending the festival with you is already positive enough...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia twists her fingers unconsciously, as if she only now realizes what she just said, then suddenly looks up...'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Eekkkk! I can't believe I just said that out loud! You didn't hear anything, got it? Just pretend it never happened!", 4: '1'}
{3: "When she's rattled like this, her expressions and gestures are so animated that you never get tired of watching her."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Otherwise... I-I guess I'll just sing for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Hmm-hmm... Hmm-hmm-hmm...', 4: '1'}
